attributes.action: End subsidised catering in Houses of Commons and Lords
attributes.additional_details: Most people and families are financially stretched these days and food banks are necessary. It is morally wrong that Members of Parliament  and The House of Lords are able to enjoy heavily subsidised catering and bar facilities, whilst the majority of the public have to struggle. Politicians claim "... we are all in this together... "     Let them prove it!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for Government
